options.name: Pit latrine without slab / Open pit

questions.name: Whether ‘Flush’ or ‘Pour flush’

options: Pit latrine without slab / Open pit

questions.name: Whether latrine is fly-proof

options: Pit latrine without slab / Open pit

questions.name: Whether latrine is made from durable materials, or approved resilient local materials

questions.name: Toilet pit made from durable or resilient local materials

options: Pit latrine without slab / Open pit

questions.name: Toilet is shared to other HH members

options.name: Shared with 10-15 people (or less) including other households
Shared with more than 15 people including other households

questions.name: Location of The Toilet Facilty

Has your pit latrine or septic tank ever been emptied?

options.name: Open ground, water body or elsewhere
I dont know where the emptier took the sludge

questions.question: Is everyone in the household able to access and use the toilet at all times of the day and night?
questions.name: Everyone has access to the toilet all the times

questions.name: Reason for not using latrines

options.name: Limited mobility prevents members from using the toilet
Distance/barriers prevent members from reaching the toilet
Toilet is not always available to all household members
Toilet is not always safe for all household members to use

questions.question: May I take a photo of your toilet facility?
When do your household member wash their hands?
questions.name: Critical times for handwashing

options.name: Before, during, and after preparing food
After changing diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet
Before and after caring for someone at home who is sick with vomiting or diarrhea.
After handling animals (before and after milking, after contacts with animals, animal products or animal wastes)
After washing and disposal of a used diaper
